Html:
I have search the forum for problems with chars, but havent found my problem.

When writting some chars like: ã, ó, õ é, è, º ,ª  and more...

The excel file becomes corrupted and impossible to open.

i have try to encode it in UTF-8 with no results, changed the charset with no results, my file e saved in UTF-8 encoding.

Any ideas ?



Thanks,

José Luis Gouveia (even my name gives an error :p)

Hmm... It should really be working. This kind of problems usually arise because many editors have poor support for editing in UTF-8.

Here is what your script should look like in Notepad++ v5.3.1 Unicode.

1. when putting like you the writer, Fatal error: Class 'PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007
2. $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValue('E' . ($i+2), $name); this is how i+m giving the cell a value.

This makes any difference?

thank you

Yes, you need to include PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007 to make it work. I still think it is an encoding problem. Try to double-check the encoding, or you can send me the generated Excel file so I can inspect (erik at phpexcel dot net).
